column1: ('Consolidated Statement of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions', 'Consolidated Statement of Cash Flows - USD ($) $ in Millions')
Adjustments to reconcile net income to net cash provided by operating activities:
Changes in fair value of MSRs, MHFS and LHFS carried at fair value
Originations and purchases of MHFS and LHFS
Proceeds from sales of and paydowns on mortgages originated for sale and LHFS
Net cash provided by operating activities
Federal funds sold, securities purchased under resale agreements and other short-term investments
Loans originated by banking subsidiaries, net of principal collected (2)
Proceeds from sales (including participations) of loans held for investment
Principal collected on nonbank entities' loans (2)
Proceeds from sales of foreclosed assets and short sales
Net cash used by investing activities
Stock tendered for payment of withholding taxes
Net cash provided (used) by financing activities
Net change in cash and due from banks
Cash and due from banks at beginning of year
Cash and due from banks at end of year
